subject: Re: [junit] @BeforeClass throws NullPointerException
msgSnippet: ... I agree with your point, but I don t know why anyone was being forced to use statics. No-one forced the OP to use @BeforeClass. @Before would have worked
messageBody:
Cédric Beust ♔ wrote:
> On 9/29/05, J. B. Rainsberger <jbrains@...> wrote:
> >
> > I agree; so what's your point again?
>
> Don't force people to use statics when there is no need for them :-)

I agree with your point, but I don't know why anyone was being forced to
use statics. No-one forced the OP to use @BeforeClass. @Before would
have worked perfectly well, and seems to me to be a better thing to do,
test isolation and all that.

At any rate, David has uncovered a defect anyway, so the question might
well be moot.

Take care.
